35 On the other hand, markedly elevated angiotensin II levels were noted in plasma samples from SARS‐CoV‐2 infected patients and were linearly associated with viral load and lung injury. Indeed, enhanced ACE activity and decreased ACE2 activity have been shown to contribute to lung injury in mouse models
33 .This suggests that medications like ACEi and ARBs which decrease ACE activity and increase upregulation of ACE2 might have beneficial effects.
